name: Boat Escape
description:
Get ready for high-speed action and intense firefights in Boat Escape. In this thrilling adventure, you'll jump into the back of a boat as you evade a relentless horde of gunmen atop speedboats. With a machine gun in hand, it's up to you to fight back and defeat your enemies.

As you progress through the levels, you'll face more enemies and planes. But don't worry - you'll have the opportunity to upgrade your weapons and equip yourself for this adventure.

This game is part of the Totem network of games!  Use your unique Totem Avatars and Items in the game for exclusive features. Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website.

🧨  https://totem-explorer.com/
